title: Drawing, May 1853 ?
medium: Graphite, brush and oxidized white gouache on gray paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at left: Plantain; again: reddish; again at bottom of left:  Leaves rich green stem / warmish yellow & greenish.  Bottom / of stalk brown, color of corn stack; again at bottom right: ceiba / Large trees / with / vines.
description: Horizontal viw of a plantain at left; a tree at right top; and the top of a ceiba tree at bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, May 1853 ?.
May 1853 ?. Graphite, brush and oxidized white gouache on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-117.
